name: Vacuulus Observation Duty
description:
Sure, this house is a little weird, but it's home. Flip through the security cameras and keep an eye on things. Make sure nothing changes. If it does, report it. Miss too many changes for too long and it's all over.

This fan game was made as a birthday present for my friend, Parimak. It uses the gameplay of the I'm On Observation Duty series (made by Notovia). It's a horror spot the difference game. This time with a bunch of assets celebrating Parimak's talent and collection of creative characters. Happy Birthday Dylan!

And for the rest of you, hey, it's a free game. Have fun!

(Fun Fact: No matter how many times you set the suggested donation price to $0 itch.io will reset it to $2)
